summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 75, Extension to Terry's 1st Addition, being the alley between 9th Avenue and Terry Avenue, from Seneca Street to Spring Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9743 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
